```{r}
n = 100
X = cbind(runif(n,0,10), runif(n,0,10), runif(n,0,10))

colnames(X) = c("x", "w", "z")
Y = X[,1]^2 + X[,2] - 3*X[,3]
data =cbind(Y,X)
colnames(data) = c("y", colnames(X))

form = formula_hal("y ~ .", smoothness_orders=1, data, bins = 4, exclusive_dot = F, generate_lower_degrees = F)

form

```



```{r}
fit = fit(form)

lst = importance(fit,  "x")
lst
```
